Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.
Root.Name: Burrow

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan deals 150 damage to target unit or structure from long range.
Root.Name: Kinetic Blast

Root.Tooltip:
Kerrigan gains +200 maximum life.
Life-regeneration rate increased by 100%.
Root.Name: Heroic Fortitude

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan leaps to her target and deals 150 damage. Can be used without a target to travel quickly.
Root.Name: Leaping Strike

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan stuns all enemies in the target area for 3sec, and causes 300 damage during this period.
Root.Name: Crushing Grip

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan's attacks deal normal damage to her target then jump to additional nearby enemies. Deals 10 damage to up to four additional targets.
Root.Name: Chain Reaction

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan dashes through enemies, dealing 50 damage to all enemies in her path.
Root.Name: Psionic Shift

Root.Tooltip: Killed Zerglings respawn from your primary Hatchery at no cost. Respawns up to 10 Zerglings every 30 until all Zerglings have returned to life.
Root.Name: Zergling Reconstitution

Root.Tooltip: Overlords morph instantly and provide 50% more supply.
Root.Name: Improved Overlords

Root.Tooltip: Extractors automatically extract vespene gas without Drones.
Root.Name: Automated Extractors

Root.Tooltip: Heals Kerrigan for 150 life and friendly biological units nearby for 50 life. An additional 50% of the amount healed regenerates over 15.
Root.Name: Mend

Root.Tooltip: Friendly Zerg ground units in the target area gain +200 maximum life and 100% increased attack speed for 10 seconds.**Does not affect air units or heroic units**
Root.Name: Wild Mutation

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan spawns six Banelings with timed life.
Root.Name: Spawn Banelings

Root.Tooltip: Drones morph in groups of two and require less supply. Resource cost and build time increased by 50%.
Root.Name: Twin Drones

Root.Tooltip: Increases the attack speed of friendly units by 30% and the life-regeneration of biological units and structures while on creep. Creep Tumors spread creep faster and farther.
Root.Name: Malignant Creep

Root.Tooltip: Vespene gas harvesting efficiency increased by 25%.
Root.Name: Vespene Efficiency

Root.Tooltip: Enemies damaged by Kerrigan become infested and will spawn 2 Broodlings with timed life if killed quickly.
Root.Name: Infest Broodlings

Root.Tooltip: Each attack temporarily increases Kerrigan's attack speed by 10%. Can stack up to 50% increased attack speed.
Root.Name: Fury

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan's ability costs and cooldowns are reduced by 20%.
Root.Name: Ability Efficiency

Root.Tooltip: Summon Leviathan, which can quickly spawn locusts to assist powerful attacks, and can use Creep Warpjump. Leviathan lasts for 60 seconds.
Root.Name: Spawn Leviathan

Root.Tooltip: Deals 300 damage to enemy units and 700 damage to enemy structures in a large area.
Root.Name: Apocalypse

Root.Tooltip: Delivers Primal Zerg forces with timed life to the battlefield. Drop-Pods contain 40 Zerglings, 5 Roaches, and 5 Hydralisks.
Root.Name: Drop-Pods

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan gains 30% of damage dealt as extra life. This bonus life constantly degenerates.
Root.Name: Mutating Carapace

Root.Tooltip: Killed Zerglings respawn from your primary Hatchery at no cost. Respawns up to 10 Zerglings every 30 until all Zerglings have returned to life.
Root.Name: Zergling Reconstitution

Root.Tooltip: Kerrigan spawns six Banelings with timed life.
Root.Name: Spawn Banelings

Root.Tooltip: Causes all nearby enemies to drop resources when killed. Effect lasts 15.0 seconds.
Root.Name: Assimilation Aura

Root.Tooltip: Deals 100 damage to enemies in a large area around Kerrigan and stuns them for 3 seconds.**Heroic units are slowed**
Root.Name: Immobilization Wave

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 2.
Root.Name: Immobilization Wave
